mapper.insert: insert into Company (company_id, company_pw, name, biz_no, owner_name, phone_num, addr, scale, sanctions_count) values (#{companyId}, #{companyPw}, #{name}, #{bizNo}, #{ownerName}, #{phoneNum}, #{addr}, #{scale}, #{sanctionsCount})
mapper.select: select count(*) from Company where company_id = #{companyId}
